snippet: California Citrus Mutual, a citrus industry group, estimated that a week of freezing temperatures in early December cost California’s $2 billion citrus industry about $441 million in ruined fruit.
abstract: Industry group California Citrus Mutual estimates that a week of freezing temperatures in early December cost California’s $2 billion citrus industry about $441 million in ruined fruit.
lead_paragraph: California Citrus Mutual, a citrus industry group, estimated that a week of freezing temperatures in early December cost California’s $2 billion citrus industry about $441 million in ruined fruit.

headline.main: December Freeze Hurt California Citrus Industry
headline.print_headline: December Freeze Hurt California Citrus Industry
